column4: hey, in 2 weeks ubuntu 7.10 will come out. how easy will it be to upgrade? will everything run as it does now? how about compiz fusion, codecs, settings, all that stuff?
however, some things might need tweaking after the upgrade, they always do :)
sounds nice, kkathman, alright, the hassle is half the fun!
sure - i've upgraded every time since warty, and for the most part everything does pretty good.
